Package com.thales.dis.mobile.idcloud.auth.exception

Class IdCloudClientException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
com.thales.dis.mobile.idcloud.auth.internal.IdCloudEnhancedErrorCodeException
com.thales.dis.mobile.idcloud.auth.internal.IdCloudEnhancedErrorCodeException.PropagatingException
com.thales.dis.mobile.idcloud.auth.exception.IdCloudClientException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public abstract class IdCloudClientException extends com.thales.dis.mobile.idcloud.auth.internal.IdCloudEnhancedErrorCodeException.PropagatingException
Thrown to indicate that an IdCloud operation has failed.

Specific reason on why the failure occurs is obtained through getError().
Since:
1.0.0
